description: Use a pre-made vegan brownie to whip up a batch of these delectable balls. With the addition of coffee, this plant-based treat is the perfect pick-me-up.
name: Coffee Brownie Balls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250 g Woolworths Plantitude Belgian Dark Chocolate Brownie

recipeInstructions.text: Crumble brownie into a medium bowl. Stir in coffee and salt flakes. Roll heaped teaspoons of mixture into balls. Roll balls in coconut to coat. Refrigerate for 30 minutes or until ready to serve.
